page.title: 19RECREATION - STRANRAER
page.content: Stranraer offers the public limited recreational facilities. There are no {Leisure}or{Sports Centres}and the 'public swimming pool', which is part of Stranraer Academy, is only open at certain times of the year. However, there are several private clubs in the town which cover a range of activities. e.g. The North West Castle Hotel has an ice rink which is used for{curling,}and The Wigtownshire Rugby Club has{squash courts}and also offers coaching. Other forms of of recreation include chess, outdoor and indoor bowling, speaking clubs and Operatic and Dramatic societies. Stranraer has a{professional football {team}which is in the Scottish Second Division and has its home ground at Stair Park. There is an{18 hole golf {course}outside the town.
